briefdescription.para: Input MsgId has been subscribed to.
Input MsgId present in output msg.
Output Msg has no missing data.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine examines each entry in the table and determines whether its field comprises a legal entry. If so, a portion of the input packet is copied to the appropriate combined output packet.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Currently the combined telemetry packets are not initialized after they are sent so values will repeat if no housekeeping update is received.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the input message.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called from CFE_TBL_Register. It determines whether the data contained in the new table is acceptable.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the new table data.

entry.para: Zero indicates acceptable table, non-zero indicates unacceptable table

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Upon the arrival of a new HK Copy Table, this routine will handle whatever is necessary to make this new data functional.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the first entry in the new copy table.
A pointer to the first entry in the run-time table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine does what is necessary in order to remove the table data from the system.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the first entry in the copy table.
A pointer to the first entry in the run-time table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine searches for the combined HK that contains the specified MID. Once found, the packet is sent. If not found, an event is generated. Also sets the data pieces for this output pkt

parameterdescription.para: - the MsgId of the combined output message to send

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This is a high level routine that controls the actions taken by HK when a copy table update is detected or a runtime table dump is pending

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine checks for missing data for the given output message. It returns HK_MISSING_DATA_DETECTED at the first piece of data that is not present. The missing Input MsgId is sent back to the caller through the given pointer named MissingInputMid.

parameterdescription.para: MsgId of the combined output message to check
A pointer to the caller provided MsgId variable
The value of the missing input MsgId

entry.para: Output Msg has no missing data.

briefdescription.para: Set Data Present Flags to 'Not Present'.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will set the data present flags to data-not-present for given combined output message

parameterdescription.para: The MsgId whose data present flags will be set.
